00020     LoopShellMesh(const string Nodes, const string ConnTable);

00024     //     const vector<vector<int > > & Connectivity, 
00025     //     string ElementType,

00028     // Build a mesh using the same nodes that are already used by another mesh
00029     // LoopShellMesh(LoopShellMesh*, const string ConnTable);
00030 
00032     // Destructor made virtual due to inheritance
00033     virtual ~LoopShellMesh() {
00034       for(map < CornerValences, vector<LoopShellShape*> >::iterator it = _shapes.begin();
00035       it != _shapes.end(); ++it){
00036     //loop over map
00037     for(uint j=0; j < (it->second).size(); j++){
00038       //loop over vector
00039       delete (it->second)[j];
00040     }
00041       }
00042 
00043       delete _quadrature;
00044     }
00045     void initializeMesh(vector<TriangleConnectivity> & connectivities);
00046     
00047   protected:
00052     map< CornerValences ,vector<LoopShellShape*> > _shapes;
00053     
00055     Quadrature*    _quadrature;
00056   };
